responsibilities: Developed and maintained web-based HRIS and Procurement systems with integrated approval workflows to streamline internal processes.
Managed and maintained IT infrastructure across multiple operational sites and warehouses to support logistics and warehouse systems.
Designed and implemented network topology tailored to site-specific requirements and business continuity.
Ensured availability, stability, and security of critical services such as email servers, file sharing, internet connectivity, and VPN access.
Administered and managed FortiGate firewalls for network security, segmentation, and VPN connectivity.
Configured and maintained Active Directory, DHCP, and shared folders with appropriate access controls.
Handled hardware troubleshooting, network maintenance, and complete IT asset management independently.
Provided 24/7 IT support to ensure uninterrupted logistics and warehouse operations.
Prepared technical documentation and reports for audits, compliance, and management evaluations.

Developed and maintained an integrated web-based Broker Operation System to digitalize and streamline brokerage workflows, including transaction processing, client management, and automated reporting.
Managed and maintained all IT equipment, including hardware, software, and peripherals across the organization.
Configured and managed shared folders with role-based access controls to secure internal data sharing and enhance collaboration efficiency.
Administered and monitored the corporate network infrastructure, ensuring stable connectivity, enforcing bandwidth management policies, and optimizing overall network performance.
Configured and maintained Active Directory and DHCP services for centralized authentication, IP address management, and secure network access control.
Performed hardware troubleshooting, software installation, and preventive maintenance to ensure smooth IT operations and minimize system downtime.
Provided technical support and on-site assistance to users, resolving daily IT issues and implementing improvements based on operational requirements.
